name: Snakkke
short_description:
Snakkke it's a SDL classical game with a new style and now avariable for Linux, Windows and Mac. We will add more funny things with the passage of time.

The goal is that will be for android, play station generations (ps2,ps3,psp...) and more consoles with a free devkits. Enjoy everyone!
